text: Adlene Harrison (November 19, 1923 - February 19, 2022) was an American politician. She was born in Dallas, Texas. Harrison was acting Mayor of Dallas in 1976. She was the city's first Jewish mayor, and its first female mayor. == Career == Harrison, a Democratic city councilwoman since 1973, replaced Wes Wise as mayor when he resigned to run for the United States Congress. She served until the election of a new mayor, Robert Folsom, at the end of the year. Harrison died on February 19, 2022 in Dallas at the age of 98. ==References== Category:1923 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Jewish American politicians Category:Jewish politicians Category:Mayors of Dallas Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Adlene Harrison
